body.p: The Application Layout preferences allow you to customize the appearance and behavior of the application's main window and editor interface. The following options are available:

ul.li: Default: Uses the standard layout provided by the application.
Predefined: Allows you to select from predefined layouts. (Note: In the current view, this option is disabled.)
Custom: Lets you specify a custom layout file. Use the provided field and buttons to load or save a custom layout configuration.

dlentry.dd: If selected, the application layout will be reset to the chosen configuration each time the application starts.

dlentry.dt: Remember layout changes for each project
dlentry.dd: If enabled, the application will remember and restore layout changes individually for each project.

dlentry.dt: Allow detaching of editors from main window
dlentry.dd: If selected, you can detach editor tabs from the main window and move them to separate windows.

Specifies the position of view tabs within the application window:
Top: Places view tabs at the top of the view area.
Bottom: Places view tabs at the bottom of the view area.

Specifies the position of editor tabs within the application window:
Top: Places editor tabs at the top of the editor area.
Bottom: Places editor tabs at the bottom of the editor area.

body.p: Note: To apply these changes, you must restart the application.
